name: Endless Forest (itch)
description:
A chill forest themed game featuring an original midi by me. 

All art assets ripped from other games.

Sprites ripped from a link to the past, to the moon, harvest moon for gameboy advanced, and Fez. 

Chipset ripped from The Darker Side of Little Red Riding Hood 

Note to the 20 Years of RPG Maker class: the RPG maker fandom wiki is really cool. It archives a lot of games, think about putting your game up there as well as itch also rpgmaker.net 

 Game made for a class project
